title: Scrap Mechanic
notes: Doesn't work at all. Opens and complains about "Please check your DirectX version" and crashes.

Runs only with PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%. Then it's very stable, saves work, fullscreen... Since it is not DXVK performance is not as good as other games. But was able to crank out 60fps with some low settings. That's in 4k.

notes: Must use PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% , however, despite no dxvk, performance is still playable, but lower than windows.
